name: Circus Freaks
description: This group consists of clown-themed characters, each with exaggerated features and distinct outfits. Most wear variations of purple, pink, green, and blue clothing, often striped or patched, giving a chaotic, carnival-like appearance. Some wear hats like top hats or pointed caps. Many are bulky in build, and several hold weapons resembling toy guns, adding a sinister twist to their clown motif.

name: Yeti
description: Yetis are large humanoids with lilac skin. Their bodies are covered in dark gray hair with the exception of their stomachs, hands, feet, ears and around their eyes. They have yellow eyes with red pupils, and a magenta nose.

name: Mathieu
description: Mathieu is an adult man with straight, medium-length, light brown hair that falls slightly over his forehead. He has thick, dark eyebrows, brown eyes, and a neatly trimmed goatee. His shirt is orange with a white spiral pattern, short sleeves, and he wears light blue jeans. His skin is fair.

name: Collector
description: InPowerless, the Collector arrived atCharlie Lien Ho's dojo in search ofBen'sUltimatrix. Charlie and Ben managed to defeat him by collapsing a water tower on him.

name: Dario
description: Dario is a brown Appoplexian with black stripes on his shoulders, back, neck, and head. He wears bandages on his forearms and has metal armor covering his shoulders and backside.

name: Xingo
description: Xingo resembles a humanoid red-nosed fox with primarily light purple fur, although his muzzle, canals, underbelly and the end of his tail are all pale purple in color. He has yellow eyes with orange pupils. He wears white gloves and a red long-sleeved polo neck shirt that covers his chest and arms. Like most cartoon animals, such as Donald Duck and Porky Pig, he does not wear pants. He also has 2 small fangs protruding from his mouth.

name: Luhley
description: Luhley's head is bulbous and more triangular than otherGalvans. A pair of goggles are also perched above the helmet aside the middle stripe.

name: Bailiff
description: The Bailiff has the white and purple color scheme of the Highbreed before the mutation. He is also much bulkier and bigger than most other Highbreed, with smaller legs as well. He sports seven eyes on his face and short horn-like extensions on his head. He has a golden badge with a star in the middle and a purple crest on his left shoulder. He also has a gray and red walkie-talkie-like device. He has a black belt with brown pockets, a wooden bat and a silver buckle.

attributes.Ability: Enhanced Strength Enhanced Durability Enhanced Intelligence Flight Claw Darts

name: Sir Patrick
description: Sir Patrick was an elderly Caucasian man with white hair, most prominently in the form of a pointed mustache and a goatee. His clothing consisted of a red collar shirt, black baggy pants tapered by silver boots, and a red cape with a white fur trim. He also wore a blocky, jeweled crown, a belt with the Forever Knights' insignia, and segmented golden sleeves.
